title: Jacob’s Prophetic Blessings
summary: Genesis 49 records Jacob’s final words as he prophetically blesses each of his twelve sons. He speaks about their futures, strengths, and weaknesses. The chapter ends with Jacob’s death and burial instructions.

faq.question: What kind of blessings did Jacob give his sons?
faq.answer: Prophetic words that foretold the character and future of each tribe.

faq.question: What did Jacob request before dying?
faq.answer: To be buried in the cave of Machpelah with Abraham and Isaac.
